channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive-Putin's demand to Ukraine: give up Donbas, no NATO and no Western troops, sources say
Russia bombs US factory in one of war’s largest attacks
Panama's Mulino to push for Chiquita's return after mass layoffs, blasts lawsuit threats
Germany to ease burden on electricity consumers from 2026
Air France Flight Makes U-turn Over Atlantic Ocean After Pilot Sends Out Signal 'Mayday, Mayday, Mayday'
Data centers face staffing crisis as demand soars for trade workers
item.description: With roughly 400,000 trade jobs unfilled in the U.S., data centers powering the AI boom face a staffing crisis.

item.title: Woman charged with murder after using abortion pill details claims against D.A.
item.description: Lizelle Gonzalez was indicted on murder charges in 2022, after she used medication to induce an abortion. The charges were later dropped.

item.title: Privacy and civil rights groups urge US colleges to end campus surveillance to protect protesters
WATCH: Hurricane Erin brings coastal flooding to North Carolina
item.description: Hurricane Erin caused massive coastal flooding in North Carolina on Tuesday as the storm continued its northward march up the East Coast.

item.title: Trump says he will go out with police, military to patrol DC Thursday night
item.description: President Donald Trump announced that he is "going out" with police and military in Washington, D.C. Thursday to oversee the surge in federal law enfo...

item.title: WATCH: Trump criticizes Biden for not letting Ukraine fight back against Russia
item.description: ABC News’ White House Correspondent Karen Travers reports that it’s “unclear” if this indicates a policy shift towards Ukrainian defense.

item.title: WATCH: Husband flees to Peru after wife found dead, California police say
item.description: Chilling surveillance video shows a husband dragging something wrapped in fabric before fleeing to Peru, California police said. They say his wife's b...

item.title: Rainbow crosswalk outside Pulse nightclub in Orlando painted over by state
item.description: Orlando Mayor Buddy Dyer and others reacted to the removal of the rainbow crosswalk outside the Pulse nightclub, the site of a massacre in 2016.

item.title: WATCH: NY appeals court throws out civil fraud judgment against Trump
item.description: A New York appeals court has thrown out the half billion-dollar civil fraud judgment handed down last year against President Trump, his family and his...

item.title: What Trump’s crime crackdown in DC looks like in photos
item.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Pedestrians walk their dogs past parked military vehicles. Commuters move past National Guards at metro stations.

item.title: Almost half of adults say they are ordering kids' meals. Here's why.
item.description: Adult customers admit to ordering from kids' menus to save money and eat smaller portions, a new survey shows.

item.title: Trump to join Washington patrol while feds deploy checkpoints around city
WNBA breaks single-season attendance record
item.description: The Women's National Basketball Association announced it broke its record for attendance during a single season, attracting more than 2.5 million fans...
